input.sentences: the shrimp that were prepared for the birthday meal were caught hours beforehand .
a delicious refreshment helped to cleanse the palate for the delicious meal .
the guys quickly polished off the meal .
a review of the meal was published in the next day 's newspaper .
the girls thought it was so silly to have a review of a birthday meal in the paper .
output.sentences: Chef Phatty prepared a beautiful shrimp meal on the grill.
Just before the meal the chef's assistant brought out various micro-brew refreshments to cleanse the palate
The food was so good the guests quickly polished off their meal.
The cookout had such good public review that it was actually published in the local newspaper.
Marcy thought it would be a good idea to act silly for the picture in the newspaper review.
